title: Microsoft's Struggles Enter the Metaverse
description: Problems plagued development of its HoloLens augmented reality headset, a ring-shaped computer worn like a crown that displays digital information on attached goggles. “We had the opportunity to own this market,” said a former director on the team.

title: Two Men Rode a Decadelong Tech Wave in China---Only One Is Staying
description: Derek Li and Rick Chang both benefited from China’s tech boom. When the atmosphere changed, each had to make a decision.
